description: Database Configuration - Oracle (or other supported databases)
notes: type: Database type (oracle, postgres, mysql, mssql, snowflake, etc.)
host: Database server hostname or IP address
port: Database server port (Oracle: 1521, PostgreSQL: 5432, MySQL: 3306, MSSQL: 1433)
schema: Default schema to query (e.g., hr, sales, dbo, etc.)
password: Database password (consider using environment variables)
For Oracle: DSN will be constructed as 'host:port/database'
PostgreSQL: psql -h host -p port -U user -d database
MySQL: mysql -h host -P port -u user -p database
MSSQL: sqlcmd -S host,port -U user -P password -d database
